delete.summary: Endpoint for deleting multiple multi store requests
delete.description: Delete multi store requests matching the specified parameters

parameters.name: minimumAgeInDays
parameters.description: Limit deletion to requests older than the number of days specified by this parameter. Default is 0, which in practice means ALL requests are to be deleted, regardless of how old they are

delete.summary: Endpoint to delete a given multi store request

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: The id of the multi store request to delete
